projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.short: A compact service for shrinking links, logging every click, and filtering obscure domains.
projects.description: User can create branded short links, redirect visitors instantly, keep links private if you wish, and review click analytics in real time. In addition, user can also export stats as JSON or CSV, and manage blacklisted domains.

projects.title: Cinemarate
projects.short: Microservices application allowing users to rate movies
projects.description: Cinemarate enables users to fetch, rate, and manage movie metadata, using an API Gateway that translates REST requests to internal gRPC services. This project demonstrates practical microservice patterns such as client-side discovery, aggregator pattern, API gateway for request entry point, and shared database for now (but "database per service" can be implemented).

projects.title: GoAuthMe
projects.short: Microservices for handling authentication, authorization, and user management for your project.
projects.description: GoAuthMe is a centralized authentication and authorization microservice designed to provide secure identity management for your applications. Built with a microservices architecture, it offers robust user management, multi-tenant support, and comprehensive security features.

projects.title: Book API
projects.short: A lightweight RESTful API for managing books with Fiber and MongoDB.
projects.description: A simple RESTful API for managing books, built with Golang and Fiber. The project implements clean architecture using a controller–repository pattern and includes full CRUD operations, pagination, middleware, and MongoDB integration. It also supports environment configuration via .env and provides structured, maintainable Go code.

projects.title: Stoccounting API
projects.short: Backend service for an inventory financial management system.
projects.description: Stoccounting is the backend service for an inventory financial management system designed to monitor cash flow, stock purchases, and sales transactions for trading businesses. The system generates key financial reports such as balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements, along with visualizations to help businesses assess their financial health and stock performance. Built as part of an academic project, this backend powers the web application using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

projects.title: Desa Tanjung Raja Profile Website
projects.short: An official village profile website built to showcase Tanjung Raja’s potential.
projects.description: This project is one of the five work programs I carried out during the KKN-PPM UGM program from June to August 2023. I completed this project independently using a website builder (WordPress) over the course of approximately one month. The project was initiated due to the absence of an official village website, which limited public access to information about the potential of Tanjung Raja, Muara Enim. The final result is a fully developed village profile website featuring relevant content and optimized SEO to improve online visibility.
